episodes.title: Epstein Latest: Andrew & Sarah BRIBES, Police & Palace Prostitutes, Teen Party 3some - Andrew Lownie
episodes.description:
We take a deep dive into the LATEST REVELATIONS and broader story around Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and Jeffrey Epstein. Our guest is best-selling author and biographer Andrew Lownie, author of ENTITLED: The Rise & Fall of the House of York, the unauthorised biography of the former Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson.

00:00:00 Intro
00:00:31 Scale of scandal and crimes
00:03:35 National security breaches
00:06:07 Kompromat, hidden cameras, Epstein, drugs, palace security
00:09:28 Sex trafficking, Russian influence
00:11:14 Andrew more extreme than Epstein
00:15:06 Death threats to author
00:18:21 Andrew central to Epstein operation
00:25:26 Was Epstein murdered?
00:27:39 How wealthy is Andrew?
00:30:22 Blair, Andrew, Kazakhstan, China
00:32:54 What does Andrew do now?
00:37:27 How damaging for the monarchy?
00:40:05 Mandelson's role
00:44:15 The role of the Clintons

---------------

episodes.title: Mandelson is the Nail in Starmer's Coffin. His Days Are Numbered.
episodes.description:
NCF Senior Fellow Rafe Heydel-Mankoo argues that Keir Starmer's position as Prime Minister is untenable following revelations he knew that Peter Mandelson continued seeing Epstein yet still made him US Ambassador. This is the latest in a pattern of incompetence.
